com.googlecode.gchart.client
Class GChart.LegendLocation

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.gchart.client.GChart.LegendLocation
Enclosing class:
GChart
public static class GChart.LegendLocation
extends java.lang.Object

Defines keywords that specify the location of the legend on the chart.

Tip: You can emulate the missing OUTSIDE_TOP and OUTSIDE_BOTTOM locations by using INSIDE_TOP or INSIDE_BOTTOM and shifting the y position appropriately via setLegendYShift.

Tip: If GChart's internally generated, single column formatted, legend key isn't appropriate, you can use your own legend widget via setLegend.

See Also:
setLegendLocation, setLegendYShift, setLegendYShift, setLegend

Field Summary
static GChart.LegendLocation INSIDE_BOTTOM
          Places the legend inside the plot area, centered along the bottom edge.
static GChart.LegendLocation INSIDE_BOTTOMLEFT
          Places the legend in the lower left inside corner of the plot area.
static GChart.LegendLocation INSIDE_BOTTOMRIGHT
          Places the legend in the lower right inside corner of the plot area.
static GChart.LegendLocation INSIDE_LEFT
          Places the legend inside the plot area, centered along the left edge.
static GChart.LegendLocation INSIDE_RIGHT
          Places the legend inside the plot area, centered along the right edge.
static GChart.LegendLocation INSIDE_TOP
          Places the legend inside the plot area, centered along the top edge.
static GChart.LegendLocation INSIDE_TOPLEFT
          Places the legend in the upper left inside corner of the plot area.
static GChart.LegendLocation INSIDE_TOPRIGHT
          Places the legend in the upper right inside corner of the plot area.
static GChart.LegendLocation OUTSIDE_LEFT
          Places the legend so that it is vertically centered on the left edge of the chart's plot area, and to the left of the y axis label.
static GChart.LegendLocation OUTSIDE_RIGHT
          Places the legend so that it is vertically centered on the right edge of the chart's plot area, and to the right of the y2 axis label.
